TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 134

barker_notes.barker_summary: Victor Blanco to Governor Viesca, Saltillo, October 23, 1828. Application for 11 leagues of land in Texas. The governor grants the application. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 134

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Victor Blanco to Governor Viesca, Saltillo, October 23, 1828. Application for 11 leagues of land in Texas. The governor grants the application. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-28-1828">October 28, 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar,*/p*
*/div1*
